channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16145] MultiRowRangeFilter constructor shouldn't throw IOException
item.description:
MultiRowRangeFilter constructor declares IOException.
The constructor:

  • sorts and merges incoming arguments - list of ranges,
  • assigns sorted list to a private variable and does not do anything else.
    There is no reason to declare IOException.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
